title: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru - Episode 6: Dawn of the Golden Witch
original_name: うみねこのなく頃に散 Episode 6: Dawn of the Golden Witch
sinopse: Now that Battler's found the truth, he's become the next game master. In order to prove to Bernkastel and Lambdadelta that he understands all of Beatrice's previous tricks, he's built a game board of his own and now has to face off against Erika once again.
